main.name: Ashiedu Faith
main.bio: Hiya there! I'm Faith, also known as faythCodes. I started this amazing journey into the software coding world and I picked my poison which is Frontend development. I have had the opportunity to learn alot in this field and had to implement problem solving skills and algorithms in different work and personal projects. With my one year experience I have gained skills set that include teamwork, creativity and good communications. I hope to even learn more and improve my problem solving skills and collaborate with more teams.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to create amazing websites for you!

education.description: Graduated with an A in my project.
Graduated with a high average result and testimonials.

work.title: Internship in Frontend Development
work.description: I worked with a team of engineers and I have been able to participate in the building of five successful projects. I have also experienced how web projects are managed to ensure efficient delivery.

testimonials.text: Faith is absolutely excellent, her depth of knowledge & her mentorship really meant a lot to us... I would definitely recommend
Learning with Faith has been AWESOME, she makes learning React so easy and approachable, she takes her time to explain and makes sure everyone understands
